title: Course Requirement check for undergraduate Students
content: To check your course requirement for graduation, send an email to CS department office and visit to see the result. ※ To apply for check up: Send email to csdept@cs.kaist.ac.kr [title]: 2011. 8 Graduation -(student id#)(name)" [content]: name: student id#: registered class for 2011 Spring: cell phone number: date to visit department office (from 2011.2.8 to 2011.2.18 only, at least 1 day after apply) ※Applying period: 2011. 2. 8(tue) ~ 2011. 2. 17(thu) ※For Inquiries: Ms. Haein Chung(042-350-3505)
